text: Did Ivan get an official invite to lead this on the creative side?
I’m not sure there is anything to invite Ivan to yet, tbh. I think we’re still waiting for Marce and Jonathan to connect to even see if there’s a there there.
But anyone feel free to let me know if I’m off base!
OK, that’s what I kind of thought. So I have not mentioned anything but always was about to in the last days ...
From my POV I don’t see any harm in mentioning it to him
But I’d probably let him know the current status so he’s aware it’s in flux.
looks like Beam is taking it elsewhere - Eric Cheong from Ace is going to be running point and he brought in a brand freelance resource he’s worked with
But understandable I suppose. Thank you for letting us know Marce.

urgh! that is a bummer. When saying ‘he brought in a freelancer’ does that mean Beam hires a freelancer or Eric Cheong did? Without knowing the full story it is hard to judge, but I’ll be curious what the outcome is. Maybe we can be ready if it does not work according to plan for Beam and we are asked to step in later :slightly_smiling_face: Wishful thinking?
Sorry to hear all of this.
Jonathan was grateful for our effort so far- sounded like a combo of things
I’m in a meeting so my brevity is only due to that
sounded like a combo of Eric having someone and reduced scope
They'll curse the day when they see what we do with our first hotel project…
'If we had only listened to them…'
